title: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report 
2. Set a default value for a list box parameter 
3. Modify the default value

Observed Behavior: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Expected Behavior: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after modifying the default value.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the report
2. Navigate to the parameter settings
3. Set a default value for a list box parameter
4. Modify the default value
5. Verify that the modified default value is retained in the list box of the report parameter.
